title: Loving His Cowgirl
description: Amy is a high-powered marketing executive in New York City, who is living the life of her dreams. Unexpectedly her world comes crashing down and she is forced to move back home to her small town. While home she vows to get back to her old life as soon as possible, but fate has other plans. Amy meets a strapping horse farmer named Chris, who brings out her dormant cowgirl. Chris reintroduces her to the things she loved and had forgotten about her small town. Follow Amyâ€™s adventure as she finds hope, happiness and even maybe love.
author: Ruth Bailey
